dishes.name: Sushi
dishes.description: Delicious bite-sized rolls of rice and fresh fish, often served with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

dishes.name: Pizza Margherita
dishes.description: A classic Italian pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil leaves, and a drizzle of olive oil.

dishes.name: Pad Thai
dishes.description: A stir-fried noodle dish made with rice noodles, tofu, shrimp, or chicken, bean sprouts, peanuts, and a tangy tamarind sauce.

dishes.name: Tacos al Pastor
dishes.description: Grilled marinated pork served on corn tortillas with pineapple, onion, cilantro, and a squeeze of lime.

dishes.name: Croissant
dishes.description: A buttery, flaky pastry made with layers of dough and filled with chocolate, almond paste, or simply enjoyed plain.

dishes.name: Curry Chicken
dishes.description: A flavorful dish made with chicken pieces simmered in a spiced tomato-based sauce, often served with rice or naan bread.

dishes.name: Fish and Chips
dishes.description: Deep-fried battered fish served with crispy fries, often accompanied by tartar sauce and mushy peas.

dishes.name: Hamburger
dishes.description: A grilled beef patty served on a bun with lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, and condiments, such as ketchup and mustard.

dishes.name: Paella
dishes.description: A traditional Spanish rice dish cooked with saffron, seafood, chicken, and vegetables, often served in a large shallow pan.

dishes.name: Peking Duck
dishes.description: A famous Chinese dish consisting of roasted duck served with thin pancakes, green onions, and hoisin sauce.

dishes.name: Lasagna
dishes.description: A layered pasta dish made with sheets of lasagna noodles, ground meat, tomato sauce, and creamy béchamel sauce.

dishes.name: Gyros
dishes.description: Grilled slices of seasoned meat (often lamb or chicken) served in a pita with tomatoes, onions, and tzatziki sauce.

dishes.name: Biryani
dishes.description: A fragrant rice dish cooked with basmati rice, meat (such as chicken, lamb, or goat), spices, and caramelized onions.

dishes.name: Pho
dishes.description: A Vietnamese noodle soup consisting of broth, rice noodles, herbs, and meat (commonly beef or chicken), often garnished with lime, bean sprouts, and chili peppers.

dishes.name: Moussaka
dishes.description: A baked casserole dish made with layers of eggplant, potatoes, ground meat (often lamb or beef), and a creamy béchamel sauce.

dishes.name: Ramen
dishes.description: A Japanese noodle soup dish consisting of Chinese-style wheat noodles served in a meat or fish-based broth, often flavored with soy sauce or miso, and toppings such as sliced pork, seaweed, and green onions.

dishes.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
dishes.description: Chunks of grilled marinated chicken served in a creamy tomato-based sauce, often flavored with spices such as garam masala, turmeric, and cumin.

dishes.name: Pierogi
dishes.description: Dumplings filled with various savory fillings, such as mashed potatoes, cheese, meat, or sauerkraut, typically boiled or fried and served with sour cream or butter.

dishes.name: Sushi Burrito
dishes.description: A fusion of Japanese sushi and Mexican burrito, typically consisting of sushi rice, fish, vegetables, and condiments wrapped in a large sheet of seaweed.

dishes.name: Shawarma
dishes.description: Thinly sliced marinated meat (often lamb, chicken, or beef) wrapped in a flatbread with tahini sauce, vegetables, and sometimes pickles or fries.
